text: University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust is an NHS trust based in London. It runs University College Hospital, Eastman Dental Hospital, the Hospital for Tropical Diseases, the National Hospital for Neurology and Neurosurgery, the Royal London Hospital for Integrated Medicine and the Royal National Throat, Nose and Ear Hospital. == References == Category:NHS trusts Category:Organisations based in London
title: University College London Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
